Author: jl777c#5810
Content: by borrowing against the KMD collateral, you are giving up the right for its future gain, in exchange for not having to absorb future loss. also, to participate in the system, you give control of the collateral to the blockchain. unlike all the other stablecoin systems i know of, there is no interest to pay for the loan against the collateral. you do give up the right to claim the KMD rewards for the duration. also, not aware of any other system that uses a purely decentralized process to issue new stablecoins. anybody at anytime is able to deposit KMD and issue pegged coins
